content.prompt: Which of the following activities would most likely account for the levels of indoor air pollution in India and sub-Saharan Africa, as shown in the graph?

choices.label: Construction of homes with more efficient insulation and increased ventilation
Use of biomass fuel sources such as wood and charcoal for cooking
Industrial power plants burning fossil fuels for electrical energy generation
Use of chemical pesticides on croplands

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
